item.description:
So...It's my Birthday and I'm celebrating at J. Timothy's. Come out and join me!

Just an informal get together to have a drink...have a few laughs...and have some of their sensational "DIRTY WINGS". If you've never tried them...give it a whirl. They are awesome.

BTW...they have an extensive beer menu...if beer is your thing! A great wine list, too!

J.Timothy's fare consists of everything from appetizers and sandwiches, to steaks, seafood, chicken and many other favorites. The wonderful assortment of appetizers, drinks, sandwiches and entrées will compliment any appetite. Check out the menu...

http://www.jtimothys.com/menus.php

At any rate, come out and play with us...cause I'm the BIRTHDAY GIRL!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Look, or ask, for Terri...Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Hang Out @ J. Timothy's...
